text: Gregory Dale Server (born January 27, 1939) is an American former politician from the state of Indiana. A Republican, he served in the Indiana General Assembly from 1972 to 2005.https://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/4532/gregory-dale- server#.VZkyH2TBzGc He served on the Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission from 2005 to 2009.http://www.in.gov/iurc/2381.htm He was appointed to the Indiana Parole Board by Mitch Daniels in 2009.http://www.in.gov/archivecalendar/EventList.aspx?fromdate=1/1/2018&todate;=1/31/2018&display;=Month&type;=public&eventidn;=61890&view;=EventDetails&information;_id=124855&print;=print Server replaced Christopher Meloy.https://www.in.gov/archivecalendar/EventList.aspx?fromdate=5/1/2018&todate;=5/31/2018&display;=Month&type;=public&eventidn;=61890&view;=EventDetails&information;_id=124855&print;=print ==References== Category:Living people Category:1939 births Category:Indiana state senators
title: Greg Server
